scripts.db:ensure: npx supabase status > /dev/null 2>&1 || npx supabase start
scripts.test: pnpm db:ensure && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:visual:run && pnpm test:e2e:run; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm db:ensure && pnpm test:e2e:run; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual: pnpm db:ensure && pnpm test:visual:run; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual:run: docker run --rm --network host --shm-size=1gb --ipc=host -v $(pwd):/work -w /work -e CI=true -e VITE_SUPABASE_URL=http://localhost:54321 -e VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json | jq -r '.ANON_KEY') -e SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json | jq -r '.SERVICE_ROLE_KEY') -e INBUCKET_URL=http://localhost:54324 -e BASE_URL=http://localhost:5173 -e TEST_USER_EMAIL=e2e-test@example.com mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.57.0-jammy /bin/bash -c 'mkdir -p /run/dbus && dbus-daemon --system --fork 2>/dev/null || true && corepack enable && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && (pnpm dev:app &) && npx wait-on http://localhost:5173 -t 60000 && pnpm exec playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=visual --project=visual-mobile'; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm test:visual:fix-permissions; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual:update: pnpm db:ensure && docker run --rm --network host --shm-size=1gb --ipc=host -v $(pwd):/work -w /work -e CI=true -e VITE_SUPABASE_URL=http://localhost:54321 -e VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json | jq -r '.ANON_KEY') -e SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json | jq -r '.SERVICE_ROLE_KEY') -e INBUCKET_URL=http://localhost:54324 -e BASE_URL=http://localhost:5173 -e TEST_USER_EMAIL=e2e-test@example.com mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.57.0-jammy /bin/bash -c 'mkdir -p /run/dbus && dbus-daemon --system --fork 2>/dev/null || true && corepack enable && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && (pnpm dev:app &) && npx wait-on http://localhost:5173 -t 60000 && pnpm exec playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=visual --project=visual-mobile --update-snapshots'; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm test:visual:fix-permissions; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual:local: pnpm db:ensure && playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=visual; pnpm db:stop
